publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6739 Stuart McMillan: World Swamp Soccer Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the team, Buddy Mollox, and the team sponsor, AK Van Rentals in Paisley, on winning the 2010 FRijj Swamp Soccer World Championship, which took place at Strachur, Dunoon; considers that the event, in its fifth year, attracted talented teams from all over the world; further notes that the winning team was made up of players from Port Glasgow and Paisley; acknowledges the success of the winning team, and wishes it all the best for 2011 when it will defend its title at the championship that will be held in Edinburgh. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Gil Paterson*, Dave Thompson*, Bob Doris*
